org.ietf.nea.pa.attribute

Interface PaAttributeValueRemediationParametersBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImAttributeValueBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<ImAttributeValue>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaAttributeValueRemediationParametersBuilderIetf

    public interface PaAttributeValueRemediationParametersBuilder
extends ImAttributeValueBuilder
    Generic builder to build an integrity measurement remediation parameters attribute value compliant to RFC 5792. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods
